name: @standalone/paima-engine
author: Paima Studios
description: Paima Engine standalone, aka executable binary wrapper around the engine core.

scripts.build:binary: npm run build && pkg packaged/engineCorePacked.js --options "experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json
scripts.build:dev-binary: npm run build:dev-binary-macos && npm run build:dev-binary-linux
scripts.build:dev-binary-macos: npm run build && pkg-dev packaged/engineCorePacked.js --output packaged/@standalone/dev-paima-engine-macos -t node18-macos-x64 -b --options "inspect,experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json
scripts.build:dev-binary-linux: npm run build && pkg-dev packaged/engineCorePacked.js --output packaged/@standalone/dev-paima-engine-linux -t node18-linux-x64 -b --options "inspect,experimental-specifier-resolution=node,no-warnings" --config package.json
